education.title: The University of Queensland
education.detailedDescription: Focused on electrical engineering, also undertook several programming courses to broaden my view.

education.title: Cairns State High School
education.detailedDescription: 2012 International Student Union leader. Graduated with an OP4.

experience.title: Graduate Electrical Engineer
duty: Calculate product parameters and write product photometry and other technical reports. Specify LED Light source, power requirements, dimming parameters.
Test for compliance standards both in Australian and around the world.
The main driver in the implementation of the MRP system . Construct the data base and work with all stakeholders to help roll out the system.
Work with overseas suppliers and source products , including travelling overseas to inspect and supervise production.

experience.title: Firmware and Hardware Engineer
duty: Team leader, assign tasks to each individual team member and co-ordinate with them to make sure the product was carried out on time and up to standards.
Design circuit for a product that can measure temperature, humidity, UV and motion.
Design and draw PCB using Altium Designer.
Design and develop the firmware, integrate the sensors and program the micro-controller using C.
